options.name: apod
options.description: NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day

options.name: iss
options.description: Displays the current location of the International Space Station as well as its inhabitants

options.name: epic
options.description: Returns an image collected by DSCOVR's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument

options.name: enhanced
options.description: Determines whether to pull and enhanced or raw image

options.name: server
options.description: Returns information for the server, such as the icon, member count, and roles

options.name: member
options.description: Returns information about a given server member, such as their icon, roles, and permissions

options.name: member
options.description: The member that the bot returns information about

options.name: role
options.description: Returns information about a given server role, such as its perms, color, and if it is mentionable

options.name: role
options.description: The role that the bot returns information about

name: help
description: A utility command for help and a list of all available commands

name: info
description: Returns information for the Orbital bot, such as the server and shard counts

name: ping
description: A utility command to show the client and API latency
